entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Marathon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:36 p.m. EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow at times mixed with rain early this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2.
